Patterns 0.99

    • Introduction to Patterns: a modeling tool dedicated to biological network modeling
  • Changelog

Retrieve network position for consistent plotting.

position.Rd

Utility function to plot networks.

position(net, ...)

Arguments

net

Network
…

Additionnal parameters

Value

Matrix with as many rows as the number of edges of network and three columns (name, xcoord, ycoord).

Examples

data(network)
position(network)
#>        nom
